mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(employee_id) + 101 empid FROM tbl_employee WHERE start_date LIKE (SELECT CONCAT(#{year}, '%'))
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_employee(employee_id, PASSWD, emp_name, PROFIL, birth, gender, emp_tel, emp_mail, emp_addr, JOB_ID, DEPTID, start_date) VALUES(#{employee_id}, #{PASSWD}, #{emp_name}, #{PROFIL}, #{birth}, #{gender}, #{emp_tel}, #{emp_mail}, #{emp_addr}, #{JOB_ID}, #{DEPTID}, #{start_date})
mapper.select: SELECT emp.employee_id, emp.emp_name, job.JOB, dept.DEPTNM, emp.start_date, emp.STATUS FROM tbl_employee emp LEFT JOIN tbl_job job ON emp.JOB_ID = job.JOB_ID LEFT JOIN tbl_department dept ON emp.DEPTID = dept.DEPTID

SELECT emp.employee_id, emp.emp_name, emp.PROFIL, emp.birth, emp.gender, emp.emp_tel, emp.emp_mail, emp.start_date, emp.quit_date, emp.emp_addr, job.JOB, dept.DEPTNM, emp.STATUS FROM tbl_employee emp LEFT JOIN tbl_job job ON emp.JOB_ID = job.JOB_ID LEFT JOIN tbl_department dept ON emp.DEPTID = dept.DEPTID WHERE emp.employee_id=#{employee_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_notification (employee_id, noti_title, noti_link) VALUES (#{employee_id}, #{noti_title}, #{noti_link})
